predicate.note: Frames file for 'obtain' based on annotation-on-the fly in financial subcorpus, and comparison with 'get' and 'receive'

example.name: get
example.text: The thrift holding company said it expects *trace* to obtain regulatory approval by year-end.

example.text: "This result obtains from the input conditions," John said.
